features.name: JWT Verification
features.description: All API endpoints validate Clerk-issued JWTs to ensure authenticity and user identity.

features.name: Dynamic CORS
features.description: CORS origins are validated against an environment-configurable allowlist to prevent unauthorized domains.

features.name: Stripe Webhook Security
features.description: Webhook endpoint verifies Stripe signature using the STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET to prevent fraudulent events.

features.name: Rate Limiting
features.description: User-specific rate limiting of 100 requests/minute implemented via KV with TTL to prevent abuse.

features.name: Security Headers
features.description: Responses include CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, and Permissions-Policy headers.

features.name: Environment Validation
features.description: Required environment variables are validated on worker startup to prevent misconfiguration.

notes: Use this knowledge base to reference implemented security features and corresponding documentation when guiding the user.
